member.name: T:StoreBaeltTicketLibrary.StorebaeltCar
member.summary: This class inherits from the the car class and new functionality is added to support implementation for Storebaeltbroen

member.name: M:StoreBaeltTicketLibrary.StorebaeltCar.#ctor(System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: This constructor allows you to create a car object with a license plate and a date

member.name: M:StoreBaeltTicketLibrary.StorebaeltCar.Price
member.summary: This method returns the correct price based on whether it is saturday or sunday and if you have a brobizz
member.returns: Returns the price of the ticket for a car

member.name: M:StoreBaeltTicketLibrary.StorebaeltCar.VehicleType
member.summary: This method gives you which type of vehicle it is
member.returns: Returns a string that tells you the vehicle type
